titles.title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to repeal a section of that Act relating to exportation or importation of natural gas.
To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to repeal a section of that Act relating to exportation or importation of natural gas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to repeal provisions amending the Natural Gas Act to extend its jurisdiction to: (1) the exportation or importation of natural gas in foreign commerce and to persons engaged in it; and (2) liquefied natural gas (LNG) terminals.
States that the Natural Gas Act shall be applied and administered as if such provisions and attendant amendments had not been enacted.
